Product Type.value: Milk chocolate coating for enrobing ice cream sticks and sandwiches

Competitor Products.value: Connoisseur Classic Vanilla Ice Cream 4 Pack | 400mL

Claims.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Appearance.value: Medium to light brown typical of milk chocolate

Flavour.value: Authentic milk chocolate flavour profile, sweet, creamy, balanced with cocoa-milk note, slight natural caramel or vanilla undertones, lingering chocolate flavour, no off-flavours

Texture.value: Smooth, crisp snap when bitten into, not chewy or soft

Viscosity.value: To be determined during sample assessments

Milk Solids (Non-fat).value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Fat Content.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Sugar Content.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Additives.value: Emulsifiers (e.g., lecithin), natural flavourings, vegetable oil (permissible amounts as per FSC guidelines), PGPR (below 5g/kg in final blend)

Processing Requirements.value: Withstand enrobing, wrapping, and boxing; maintain softness during wrapping to avoid sharding

Processing Parameters.value: 40-60℃ in kibble melter for 90 mins per 1000kg; ice cream at -37.5℃ during dipping; 118 seconds single index, 60 seconds double index

Cocoa Certification.value: Rainforest Alliance, Fair Trade, or Cocoa Horizons

Ingredient Restrictions.value: No artificial trans fats, no partially hydrogenated oils, no high-fructose corn syrup, no carmine, no annatto, no titanium dioxide, no artificial colours as defined by Natcol, no processed Eucheuma seaweed (INS 407a)

Palm Oil Requirements.value: RSPO Certified (Segregated as a minimum), entire supply chain RSPO Certified by 2027

Mandatory Requirements for Acceptance.value: AFGC PIF 6.0 completed, no irradiation, no dangerous goods flavours, sodium citrate must be tri-sodium citrate, no processed Eucheuma seaweed (INS 407a), RSPO Certified Palm Oil, Cocoa Certification (RA, FT, CH), no monkey harvesting for coconut, RTRS/ISCC+ for South American soy

Flowability.value: Must flow well for enrobing process

Packaging Durability.value: Must withstand wrapping and boxing without sharding
